hero.core_tension: High-value windows stretch and scatter across many micro-windows. Operators must choose where to place scarce creative drops to capture margin, not just volume. The mechanism is simple: timing wins are now segmented.
hero.setting: Clean studio table or retail staging area. Wide negative space. Printed micro-drop calendars and sample packs laid out like field maps.
hero.persona: Brand merchant and creative lead in active collaboration.
hero.action: Hands point and move sample gift boxes and annotated week cards to mark prioritized micro-windows.
hero.urgency_symbol: Overlapping translucent ribbons and stacked windows that step forward to show priority, suggesting stretched timing without a clock.
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights, soft key from a high angle, muted fill, strong rim light to separate subjects, and clean negative space.
hero.alt: Two operators planning a micro-drop with sample boxes and an annotated calendar.

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings and radial arcs mapping season to micro-windows to 1:1 nodes.
signal_map.motion: Flow lines from macro ring into focused arcs. Pulsing nodes where personalization compresses conversion. Paths converge on creative drops.
signal_map.palette: Matte neutrals base with confident teal highlights and warm gold accents; materials suggest matte paper, brushed metal pins, and vellum overlays.
signal_map.alt: Abstract rings showing micro-windows, cohort tokens, and pulsing personalization nodes.
